description: Residents begin receiving enigmatic 'Halden directives' urging everything from peace to protest. Rumors of a 'ghost in the code' sweep the city.
A decision is reached to let the adaptive code spread; eyes turn to the BCI as it starts rewarding those following the new directives and flagging others.
The city erupts in confusion and unrest as factions fight for the meaning and ownership of the 'Halden protocol.'
